Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Character; local Player;
local RELOAD_TIME = 8
------------------------------------------ local function WaitFor(parent) return setmetatable({}, { __index = function(tb, child) return function() while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(child) end end; }) end ----------------------------------------
local Handle = WaitFor(Tool).Handle() local NextFireAt = WaitFor(Tool).NextFireAt() local ThrowSound = WaitFor(Handle).ThrowSound() local ExplodeSound = WaitFor(Handle).ExplodeSound()
local GrenadeScript = WaitFor(Tool).GrenadeScript()
local function Now() return game.Workspace.DistributedGameTime end
---------------------------------------------
local Velocity = 120 function computeLaunchAngle(dx, dy, grav) -- This function is nasty or what? :P -- There are ways to solve launch angle of a projectile given a point in 3D space -- This one solves for tan(theta)
-- Simplify the distance formula of a projectile local g = math.abs(grav) local inRoot = (Velocity * Velocity * Velocity * Velocity) - (g * ((g * dx * dx) + (2 * dy * Velocity * Velocity))) if inRoot <= 0 then return 0.25 * math.pi end local root = math.sqrt(inRoot) local inATan1 = ((Velocity * Velocity) + root) / (g*dx)
local inATan2 = ((Velocity * Velocity) - root) / (g*dx) local a1 = math.atan(inATan1) local a2 = math.atan(inATan2) if a1 < a2 then return a1 end return a2 end
---------------------------------------------
local HoldAnim, ThrowAnim;
Tool.Equipped:connect(function(mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)
local HoldAnimSrc = WaitFor(Tool).HoldAnim() HoldAnimSrc.AnimationId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88743592' local ThrowAnimSrc = WaitFor(Tool).ThrowAnim() ThrowAnimSrc.AnimationId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88743566'
HoldAnim = Character.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(HoldAnimSrc) ThrowAnim = Character.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(ThrowAnimSrc)
--setup first anim / cursor cycle if Now() > NextFireAt.Value then Handle.Transparency = 0 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png' HoldAnim:Play() else Handle.Transparency = 1 Delay(NextFireAt.Value - Now(), function() mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png' Handle.Transparency = 0 HoldAnim:Play() end) end
mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() --we track the reload time like this so that the player can't fire faster with --rapid dis / re-equipping, which will actually be common usage with this gear. if Now() > NextFireAt.Value then NextFireAt.Value = Now() + RELOAD_TIME -- local gr = Instance.new('Part') gr.TopSurface = 'Smooth' gr.BottomSurface = 'Smooth' gr.FormFactor = 'Custom' gr.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) gr.CFrame = Handle.CFrame ExplodeSound:Clone().Parent = gr local mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh', gr) mesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88795005' mesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88795021' local sc = GrenadeScript:Clone() sc.Parent = gr sc.Disabled = false WaitFor(sc).creator().Value = Player
--calc velocity local toTarget = mouse.Hit.p - gr.Position local dy = toTarget.y toTarget = Vector3.new(toTarget.x, 0, toTarget.z) local dx = toTarget.magnitude toTarget = toTarget.unit
Velocity = math.min(120, 40 + dx)
local theta = computeLaunchAngle(dx, dy, 196.2)
local vY = math.sin(theta)*Velocity local vX = toTarget.x * math.cos(theta) * Velocity local vZ = toTarget.z * math.cos(theta) * Velocity
gr.CanCollide = false Delay(0.1, function() gr.CanCollide = true end) gr.Velocity = Vector3.new(vX, vY, vZ) gr.Parent = game.Workspace
--play sound / anim ThrowSound:Play() HoldAnim:Stop(0) ThrowAnim:Play(0,1,1)
--reload Handle.Transparency = 1 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png' wait(RELOAD_TIME) HoldAnim:Play() Handle.Transparency = 0 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png' end end) end)
Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() if ThrowSound then ThrowSound:Stop() end if ThrowAnim then ThrowAnim:Stop() end if HoldAnim then HoldAnim:Stop() end end)

------------------------------------------ local function WaitFor(parent) return setmetatable({}, { __index = function(tb, child) return function() while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(child) end end; }) end ----------------------------------------
--remove us if all else fails game.Debris:AddItem(script.Parent, 30)
----------------------------------------
local DAMAGE_PER_SECOND = 10
local Grenade = script.Parent local GrenadeScript = WaitFor(Grenade).GrenadeScript() local Creator = WaitFor(GrenadeScript).creator().Value local Character = Creator.Character local ExplodeSound = WaitFor(Grenade).ExplodeSound()
---------------------------------------
local Handling = false Grenade.Touched:connect(function(part) --ignore collisions with firer's stuff if Character and part:IsDescendantOf(Character) then return end if Handling then return end Handling = true
--end grenade Grenade.Anchored = true Grenade.CanCollide = false Grenade.Transparency = 1
--play sound ExplodeSound:Play()
-- local basePos = Grenade.Position local upsideDownCF = CFrame.Angles(0,0,math.pi)
--do explode local BlastPart = Instance.new('Part', game.Workspace) BlastPart.FormFactor = 'Custom' BlastPart.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) BlastPart.Transparency = 0.3 BlastPart.Anchored = true BlastPart.CanCollide = false BlastPart.Archivable = false BlastPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(Grenade.Position)*CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2,0,0) local BlastCFrame = CFrame.new(Grenade.Position)*CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2,0,0) local BlastMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh', BlastPart) BlastMesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1080954' BlastMesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=70759279' game.Debris:AddItem(BlastPart, 10)
Spawn(function() for i = 0, 1, 0.2 do wait() BlastPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(0, math.sqrt(i)*10,0)*BlastCFrame BlastMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(4 + 4*i, 4 + 4*i, 4 + math.sqrt(i)*24) end for i = 0, 1, 0.1 do wait() BlastPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(0,10 - i*i*4,0)*BlastCFrame BlastMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(8 + i*2, 8 + i*2, 28 - i*i*8) BlastPart.Transparency = 0.3 + 0.7*i*i end BlastPart:Destroy() end)
wait(0.2)
--create clouds local cloudList = {} for i = 1, 10 do local cloud = {} cloud.A = math.random()*10 cloud.B = math.random()*10 cloud.C = math.random()*10 cloud.Velocity = Vector3.new(math.random()-0.5, 0, math.random()-0.5)*6 -- local part = Instance.new('Part') part.Anchored = true part.CanCollide = false part.Archivable = false part.FormFactor = 'Custom' part.Shape = 'Ball' part.Size = Vector3.new(6,6,6) part.Transparency = 0.2 part.CFrame = CFrame.new(basePos + Vector3.new(math.random(-3,3), 2, math.random(-3,3)))*upsideDownCF part.TopSurface = 'Smooth' part.BottomSurface = 'Smooth' part.Name = 'PoisonCloud' -- local mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh', part) mesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1095708' mesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=70759279' mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(5,8,7) mesh.Name = 'Mesh' -- local smoke = Instance.new('Smoke', part) smoke.Color = Color3.new(0,1,0) smoke.Opacity = 0.6 smoke.RiseVelocity = 0 smoke.Size = 0.6 smoke.Name = 'Smoke' -- cloud.Part = part -- cloudList[#cloudList+1] = cloud end
--track touching local LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap = {} local TouchingPartsMap = {} local TouchingHumanoidMap = {} for _, cloud in pairs(cloudList) do cloud.Part.Touched:connect(function(part) local hum = (part.Parent or game):FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hum then TouchingHumanoidMap[hum] = true hum.WalkSpeed = 4
--initial damage if not LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap[hum] then local tag = GrenadeScript.creator:Clone() tag.Parent = hum game.Debris:AddItem(tag, 2) hum:TakeDamage(10) LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap[hum] = tick() end end end) end
--put the clouds into the workspace for _, cloud in pairs(cloudList) do game.Debris:AddItem(cloud.Part, 15) --by 15 second we should have been done, --ensure that we don't leave behind anything if all else fails. cloud.Part.Parent = game.Workspace end
--do stuff local StartTime = tick() local LastTime = StartTime while true do --timestep wait() local Now = tick() local dt = Now - LastTime local Elapsed = Now-StartTime LastTime = Now
--progress local T = Elapsed/10
--end if T > 1 then break end
--do effects to clouds for _, cloud in pairs(cloudList) do cloud.Part.CFrame = cloud.Part.CFrame * CFrame.new(cloud.Velocity*dt*(1-T)) cloud.Part.Transparency = 0.2 + 0.8*T cloud.Part.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(5 + 2*math.sin((cloud.A/10+1)*Elapsed), 8, 7 + 2*math.sin((cloud.B/10+1)*Elapsed)) cloud.Part.Smoke.Opacity = 0.6 - 0.6*T*T cloud.Part.Smoke.Size = 0.6 - 0.6*T cloud.Part.Smoke.Color = Color3.new(0 + 0.3*(0.5*math.sin((cloud.A/10+1)*Elapsed+cloud.C)+0.5), 0.5 + 0.5*(0.5*math.sin((cloud.C/10+1)*Elapsed+cloud.B)+0.5), 0 + 0.3*(0.5*math.sin((cloud.B/10+1)*Elapsed+cloud.A)+0.5)) end
--do damage to humanoids for hum in pairs(TouchingHumanoidMap) do local lastT = (LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap[hum] or tick()) if Now-lastT > 0.5 then local torso = (hum.Parent or game):FindFirstChild('Torso') if torso then --find a nearby cloud local nearestCloud, atDist = nil, math.huge for _, cloud in pairs(cloudList) do local sep = (cloud.Part.Position - torso.Position).magnitude if sep < atDist then nearestCloud = cloud atDist = sep end end if atDist < 5 then local dmg = (Now-lastT)*DAMAGE_PER_SECOND local tag = GrenadeScript.creator:Clone() tag.Parent = hum game.Debris:AddItem(tag, 2) hum:TakeDamage(dmg) LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap[hum] = Now else TouchingHumanoidMap[hum] = nil LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap[hum] = nil hum.WalkSpeed = 16 end else TouchingHumanoidMap[hum] = nil end end end end
wait(2) --wait for the clouds to fade a bit --delete the clouds for _, cloud in pairs(cloudList) do cloud.Part:Destroy() end --fix all of the humanoids for hum in pairs(TouchingHumanoidMap) do hum.WalkSpeed = 16 end
--and finally get rid of us Grenade:Destroy() end)
